definition: 存在的、供應量大的；豐富的、充裕的
example: The desert has a lot of sand. (沙漠裡有很多沙子。)
An abundant supply of cheap labor. (廉價勞動力的充足供應。)
fillInTheBlankExamples: The country has an ____ supply of natural resources. (這個國家有大量的的自然資源供應。)

synonymReplacementExamples.originalSentence: The forest has a lot of animals.
Rainfall was very plentiful this year.

clozeTestExamples.clozeSentence: The island boasts an ______ supply of fresh water.
clozeTestExamples.clozeSentenceTranslation: 这个岛屿拥有丰富的淡水供应。

clozeTestExamples.clozeSentence: Due to the heavy rain, there was an ______ harvest this year.
clozeTestExamples.clozeSentenceTranslation: 由于雨水充足，今年获得了大丰收。

example: An enormous amount of money. (巨額的錢。)
An enormous challenge. (一個巨大的挑戰。)
fillInTheBlankExamples: The elephant was ____, much bigger than expected. (這頭大象很巨大，比預期的大得多。)
synsets: S: (adj) enormous (extraordinarily large in size or extent or amount or power or degree)

synonymReplacementExamples.originalSentence: The little boy saw a very big elephant.
synonymReplacementExamples.originalTranslation: 小男孩看到了一頭很大的大象。
synonymReplacementExamples.recommendedReplacementSentence: The little boy saw an enormous elephant.

synonymReplacementExamples.originalSentence: Building the bridge was a huge task.
synonymReplacementExamples.originalTranslation: 建造這座橋樑是一項巨大的任務。
synonymReplacementExamples.recommendedReplacementSentence: Building the bridge was an enormous task.

clozeTestExamples.clozeSentence: The company made an ______ profit last quarter.
clozeTestExamples.clozeSentenceTranslation: 公司上个季度获得了巨额利润。

clozeTestExamples.clozeSentence: The new stadium is of ______ size, capable of holding thousands.
clozeTestExamples.clozeSentenceTranslation: 新体育场规模巨大，能容纳数千人。

example: The vase is very fragile. (這個花瓶很脆弱。)
synsets: S: (adj) fragile (easily broken or damaged or destroyed)

clozeTestExamples.clozeSentence: Handle with care, as the contents are very ______.
clozeTestExamples.clozeSentenceTranslation: 请小心处理，因为里面的物品非常易碎。

clozeTestExamples.clozeSentence: The antique teacups are incredibly ______ and must be handled gently.
clozeTestExamples.clozeSentenceTranslation: 这些古董茶杯非常脆弱，必须轻拿轻放。

example: A diligent student. (一個勤奮的學生。)
Diligent efforts are required. (需要勤奮的努力。)
fillInTheBlankExamples: She is a very ____ worker. (她是一個非常勤奋的工人。)
synsets: S: (adj) diligent (characterized by care and perseverance in carrying out tasks)

synonymReplacementExamples.originalSentence: He always works hard on his assignments.
synonymReplacementExamples.recommendedReplacementSentence: He is always diligent on his assignments.

synonymReplacementExamples.originalSentence: She is a very industrious employee.
synonymReplacementExamples.originalTranslation: 她是一個非常勤奮的員工。
synonymReplacementExamples.recommendedReplacementSentence: She is a very diligent employee.

clozeTestExamples.clozeSentence: He is a ______ student, always submitting his homework on time.
clozeTestExamples.clozeSentenceTranslation: 他是一个勤奋的学生，总是按时交作业。

clozeTestExamples.clozeSentence: Success often comes to those who are ______ and persistent.
clozeTestExamples.clozeSentenceTranslation: 成功常常属于那些勤奋且坚持不懈的人。
